Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: When HART has successfully been listed on an exchange, you will be able to access your HART through that exchange.  If you participated in the private sale or pre-sale rounds of the ITS, your tokens are subject to a vesting schedule. This means you will only get control of a certain percentage per a set time period, depending on the phase of the sale in which you contributed.  If you participated in the public sale, all of the HART corresponding to your contribution will be made available to you as soon as the listing on an exchange has been completed. Tokens acquired in the public sale are thus not subject to a vesting schedule.

Author: JAS0NTY
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: Can you briefly explain more about the data qualifiers?

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: In the HARA Ecosystem, a data qualifier can be anyone who holds HARA Token and interacts with the data provider community, or transacts with the data providers in the supply chain. Data qualifiers are incentivized with HARA Token to do their part consistently. The work they perform will add to the rating of the data sets on the HARA Data Exchange, influencing buyers to acquire certain data sets. The data qualifiers help lift the HARA Data Exchange to a higher level of usefulness and guarantee the visibility of quality data.

Author: HarveySpecter_
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: What's the significance of the Value added data services to HARA?

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: These are the Companies and institutions that access and process raw data from HARA Ecosystem, and resubmit it as ‚Äòenriched data‚Äô. These can be academic institutions, brands, data analytics, financial technology, and agriculture technology companies. They create value-added insights from the raw data and share in the proceeds with the original data providers by submitting the cleansed, organized, and structured data back to the HARA Ecosystem

Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: We have multiple data providers, Data providers include individual data contributors, data companies, cooperatives, NGOs, field agents, and governments. They can use the data exchange to assess the quality of their data and monetize it by exchanging it for tokens.

Author: JAS0NTY
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: I see that farmers are the main drivers of the exchange, what data do they need to provide?

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: The farmers need to share a lot of data, which are:  Farmer related data, Location specific data, Cultivation data, Ecological data & Market Information & Transactional data.

Author: JAS0NTY
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: That sounds like a lot and there's still some Meta - data I think, do you have anyone that can check the quality of the data?

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: We have our Data Qualifiers that do that for us, HARA is implementing a qualification mechanism to drive the accurate rating of data. Any data submitted on the exchange must earn a minimum basic rating before any exchange can occur. This adds a secondary level of information aggregation to allow for dynamic forecasting. Data providers can allocate more token in order to drive more qualifications, thereby increasing its rating.

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: The first research that included HARA data will be released soon by BOI Research. The first report will be about rice production in Indonesia.  Read the whole article here  Follow: Twitter Join: HARA Telegram

Author: JAS0NTY
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: What can their research contribute to HARA?

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: They will provide quarterly reports around rice production in Indonesia, The reports created by BOI Research uses government data as a basis and then tests the validity and accuracy of that data with data they uncover themselves, and data supplied by HARA. BOI is a value-added service in data enrichment.

Author: TIGER_
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: Can u explain why you collaborate with banks like BNI and BTPN?

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: One of the many ways HARA helps farmers is by providing Micro Loans, We do these with the help of Banks especially the ones mentioned, the data that HARA provides will make data collection process faster & HARA's data collection model helps ease the administrative process for the loan application. We collaborated with banks so that our farmers can easily access micro loans in which the farmers will need as capital in buying seeds to grow, These collaborations will also eliminate the farmer's reliance in loan sharks which has an interest markup of almost 300% .

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: The partnership between HARA and Bluzelle will focus on optimizing stakeholders‚Äô income potential by extending Bluzelle's data storage services to the HARA ecosystem. Bluzelle is a decentralized, on-demand, scalable database service that leverages underused computer resources from people around the world by turning them in into storage providers for its network, for which the providers are compensated.In the partnership, HARA will help extend Bluzelle‚Äôs services of data storage to any stakeholder that requires their services to make the most out of both the companies‚Äô ecosystems, and optimize the stakeholder‚Äôs income potential. By introducing Bluzelle to a greater variety of customers, HARA will help fulfill Bluzelle and HARA‚Äôs shared mission to empower people through data.

Author: Nivia1st
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: 1 million is not a big number, are you sure it will be reached by the end of the year? and what about areas that have an unstable internet network, can't that make a problem? I see your platform is good but without the internet it won't be maximal..

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: We are coordinating with local governments, NGOs and community leaders to help us in acquiring farmers, For the areas that have an unstable internet connection, Our app can work offline and will able to upload when there is internet.

Author: joniboini
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: 1 million is a big number, we're talking about people here who might not understand new technology, has difficulties on switching lifestyle and understanding stuff like uploading data and so on. I believe 1 million is a very big number actually, kinda ambitious even. It will take days or months just to convince 1 or 10 people to use or join HARA, so 1 million is a big target.  Quote from: HARAToken on February 08, 2019, 03:47:15 PM We are coordinating with local governments, NGOs and community leaders to help us in acquiring farmers, For the areas that have an unstable internet connection, Our app can work offline and will able to upload when there is internet.  I think it's quite difficult to acquire or onboarding farmers (assuming they're old, like >40 years old). A possible plan in my mind is to promote HARA to college students which majored in agriculture so that they'll join the network after the finished or while they're studying. Generation Z or young people in general, especially in Indonesia is familiar with tech already, so that's a plus. University can help them to make a connection with local farmers too. So it's easier to get new customers or indirect customers.

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: We have field agents to assist famers in those aspects and also our deployment team, We will attract the farmers with benefits in joining HARA as we have done before, benefits like loans, loyalty points, and market data.  That's a great suggestion, but for now we will focus on acquiring the existing farmers. Since they are the ones that need help the most and also our goal is to improve their current situation by joining HARA

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: Yes, you're right it's a long wait but definitely plausible in the future, but for now our main focus are the existing farmers who are in the bottom of the pyramid

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: Our product is the decentralized data exchanged and the data providers provide the data, and that buyers access the data. Data buyers include enterprises such as banks, insurance companies, retailers, agriculture input suppliers, NGOs, and government ‚Äì all the way down to local communities or even individuals.

Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: For now, their loyalty points can be used to redeem farming goods and also daily necessities like fertilizers and phone credits, we decided on this so that we can make sure that the incentive they will receive will go to improving their farming and sustaining their needs.

Body: Wishing you a very happy Chinese New Year! We wish you success, happiness, and prosperity üë≤üôè  Follow: Twitter Join: HARA Telegram

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: HARA is using its very own HARA Chain. We built it because the transaction throughput is very low in Ethereum main net, and on the HARA Chain, this rises to 500 transactions per second. Also, by using HARA Chain, it will greatly reduce costs as internal transactions are free and the chain can be fully customized to suit HARA's needs.

Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: Our pilot project began in Indonesia, The markets that HARA will focus on are developing countries located near the equator, characterized by long growing periods (many are year-round), and where access to mobile phone service is available. Dattabot has identified eight ( countries that possess these attributes, where collectively, these countries represent nearly one-third of all smallholder farmers in the world, which are: Bangladesh, Indonesia, Vietnam, Thailand, Kenya, Uganda, Mexico, and Peru.

Author: HarveySpecter_
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: Can I know why did HARA choose to use Ethereum?

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: HARA needs to be implemented by using a proven technology that's why the decision to use Ethereum was made. Also, Ethereum has the biggest dApps projects connection support to other layers through Oraclize, Infura, and so forth. It also has  the most robust community and developer support. HARA is not closing its doors to other blockchain tech, that's why HARA is also exploring reasearch and development partnerships with other blockchain tech companies.

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: When HART has successfully been listed on an exchange, you will be able to access your HART through that exchange. Depending on the platform, you might have to make an account and pass the platform‚Äôs KYC process if you have not done so yet.  If you participated in the private sale or pre-sale rounds of the ITS, your tokens are subject to a vesting schedule. This means you will only get control of a certain percentage per a set time period, depending on the phase of the sale in which you contributed. If you‚Äôre unsure about what vesting schedule your tokens are subject to, don‚Äôt hesitate to reach out to us on Telegram or via email.  You may read the full article here

Author: joniboini
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: Is there any plan to build your own blockchain? Or are you looking for interoperability solution like Cosmos/Tendermint or Polkadot? I'm not sure how will all of this play out when you already release the tokens and it's used by the ecosystem. I'm saying that for some new users, token swap might be difficult. Not sure how farmers will react to that too. So it's better to decide from the beginning whether you'll build your own blockchain and keeping interoperability for others blockchain to ensure there's no need to do a difficult token swap or something like that.

Raising the price might be counterproductive.  the value of the cryptocurrencies that may be used to purchase HARA Tokens can be. As a result, the value of HARA Tokens may in part be affected by or derived from the continued willingness of market participants to exchange fiat currency for cryptocurrencies. Changes in such currencies relative to each other as well as to fiat currencies may accordingly affect the price and, in turn, the value of HARA Tokens.

Author: TIGER_
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: How do you make sure that data qualifiers are providing accurate data?

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: HARA is implementing a machine learning algorithms to ensure accurate data quality over vast amounts of samples. Much like image captchas, Data Qualitification will get better over time. Additionally, any submitted data on the exchange must earn a minimum rating before any exchange can happen.

Author: TIGER_
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: That's great but how will you ensure the quality of the  Data qualifiers?

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: a data qualifier‚Äôs rating comes from qualifying other data qualifiers in order to ensure high quality data is being submitted. The tokens for rating qualifiers are initially taken from HARA seeding fund then funded by portion of the proceeds from the ongoing transactions. This acts as a self-regulating mechanism to ensure that data qualifiers are providing accurate data and to avoid data qualifiers gaming the system. The rating that data qualifiers received enables them to have access to better tiers of mini tasks and automatically increase their credibility.

Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: HARA is a decentralized data exchange, HARA is a blockchain-based data exchange platform and operates its own Ethereum enabled blockchain. Our recent achievements for the past months such as the development of our deployment show the progress of our project, and our solid team working on developing it further makes it a promising project. We have multiple partners and advisors that assist us in the development of our project, HARA plans to revolutionize the agriculture sector and help small farmers with blockchain technology.  You can read more about how HARA will revolutionize the agriculture and food sector in our whitepaper. Also, follow us in our Telegram Community to get more updates about what HARA is up to. Thanks

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: HARA will definitely be a good solution for the agriculture sector   since we empower smallholder farmers with data by incentivizing them with points in which they can use to buy farming goods and also provide them access to microcredit loans. Which will overall increase the quantity, and the quality of their yield. HARA plans to revolutionize the agriculture sector and help small farmers with blockchain technology.

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: With the help of this collaboration, BTPN-S has approved of Rp 1.162.500.000 ($80.000) in loans. The loans ranged from a minimum of Rp 500.000 ($35) to a maximum of Rp 50.000.000 ($350) per farmer, with the average coming down to around Rp 1.650.000 ($115) per farmer. This will eliminate the farmers' reliance on loan sharks which has an interest of up to 300%. You can read more in Medium

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: For now, HARA is mainly focusing on Indonesia, but HARA also has other target countries. All target countries have high potentials in mobile and banking/microfinance institutions reach. According to the International Finance Corporation (IFC), Indonesia, for example, is categorized as a major potential country as it has a large unbanked population and high mobile penetration. Other target countries, which are: Kenya, Mexico, Uganda, Vietnam, and Thailand, are categorized as quick risers. This category has high mobile penetration and high adoption rate in mobile money or digital wallet.

Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: The platform architecture ensures: ‚Ä¢ Data providers own the personal data and have full control over it. ‚Ä¢ Personal data is always encrypted and data providers hold the key to decrypt it. ‚Ä¢ Transaction of personal data in the ecosystem is carried out with explicit permission and consent from the data provider. Data provider also understands how the data set is used and for what purpose. ‚Ä¢ Personal data transactions are fully transparent and traceable on the blockchain and anonymity of trading parties is completely protected

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: The data providers do not sell their data, although they get incentivized with points in which they can use to exchange with goods. The data is securely stored and processed in the HARA data exchange platform. In the HARA data exchange platform, document encryption is realized through the use of AES256 algorithm in producing an encryption key. The encryption key is further broken down into several keys known as secret keys. The secret keys are distributed amongst data provider‚Äôs wallet, HARA system and trusted third-party (e.g. government, value-added service providers). To decrypt the data, the minimum of three keys is required. Any party (other than the data provider) that possesses the key cannot decrypt the data without the consent of other key holders.

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: Data is securely stored and processed in the HARA data exchange platform. A combination of IPFS permanent web, Bluezelle protocols, and Amazon web services (S3 and Dynamo DB) will be implemented as data storage systems off the chain. Proof of existence smart contract is deployed in the blockchain to ensure data is tamper-proof and uncompromised. Every data is signed with fingerprint-like proof. If the data is changed, then the associated fingerprint will also change. To verify the data, the fingerprint must match or it is considered as tampered. Nevertheless, data providers should also ensure that a safe and reliable data storage and accessible mechanism is maintained.

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: Yes, because mostly the hindrance is a capital limitation, but with the data that HARA collects, farmers can apply to micro-credit loans so that they will have enough capital to buy farming inputs and increase their yield. The data that HARA collects is bought by banks to analyze so that they can make an accurate estimate if the farmers can pay back the loan, it's better than turning to loan sharks with high interest rates, so far, there have been 573M IDR microloans with 100% repayment rate  you could be a HARA stakeholder! just  join our public sale this January 2019

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: HARA Field Agent can eventually earn a salary of up to $700 dollars per month! they will just have to put in the work and have a mobile phone with internet connection  A Field Agent will be able to then transform to become a HARA Farm Manager. If a Field Agent is eligible to be promoted to a Farm Manager will depend on his local network and the quantity and quality of work he has previously done.

Author: F3L1X
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: What's the difference between field agent and farm manager?

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: The role of the Field Agent is more on technical like collecting data while the Farm Manager's role is more on administrative like  The Farm Manager serves as an agent between the farmers and the services they would like to get access to. For example, the Farm Manager could act as an agent for a loan program for a bank, or for an insurance company to arrange insurance for the farmers‚Äô crops.  The Farm Manager can also act as an agronomist, an expert on crops and soils, who translates the data insights from HARA to the farmers to improve their business practices.  Finally, the Farm Manager could play the role of a sales agent who helps farmers to buy farm inputs, sell their yields, and monitor the loan disbursements and payments.

Author: D1jay
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: Hara is a global and open-blockchain based data exchange platform that focuses on improving the lives of famers i like the idea that a blockchain project is looking to empower farmers around the globe, but am not quite sure how is this going to directly affect the life/lives of farmers in a remote area, what do they stand to benefit from HARA? the concept is very appealing, just looking for a connection to better the lives of farmers.

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: It will directly affect the farmers in a lot of ways, with HARA the farmers will have access to loyalty points in which they can exchange with farming goods and daily necessities at HARA accredited kiosks and it will also help the farmers acquire microcredit loans and insurance. The farmers can also use HARA as a form of a data source to increase the quality of their yield and they can acquire accurate data so that they can know the substantial amount of farming resources to use so that none would go to waste.

Author: HarveySpecter_
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: What is this project?

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: Hara is a Decentralized Data Exchange  HARA Ecosystem provides decentralized data exchange for data providers to provide their data and data buyers to access the data. Powered by blockchain technology, this exchange is traceable, transparent, and secured. Vast amounts of data, ranging from farmers identification data, cultivation data, location-specific data, ecological data, and market information and transaction data, are collected via a variety of sources including IoT and satellite as well as from third-parties such as farmers, governments, scientists, academia, farm-input manufactures and other entities. These data originators are enabled to upload datasets to the data exchange and sell their data to other third-party data buyers via the decentralized token-based data exchange.

Author: HarveySpecter_
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: Data exchange? so data providers buy the data and put it on Hara and resell it?

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: HARA field agents are the data providers they collect data from the Hara farmers but data providers can also be Data providers include individual data contributors, data companies, cooperatives, NGOs, field agents, and governments. They can use the data exchange to assess the quality of their data and monetize it by exchanging it for tokens.

Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: What are value added services? what's their role?

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: Companies and institutions that access and process raw data from HARA Ecosystem, and resubmit it as ‚Äòenriched data‚Äô. These can be academic institutions, brands, data analytics, financial technology, and agriculture technology companies. They create value-added insights from the raw data and share in the proceeds with the original data providers by submitting the cleansed, organized, and structured data back to the HARA Ecosystem.

Author: F3L1X
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: Is being a data qualifier the same with doing a bounty programs?

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: No, because doing bounty programs does not require you to be part of the HARA ecosystem. A data qualifier should be connected to the data they are qualifying to ensure accuracy of qualification activities.

Author: F3L1X
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: How can you make sure that the platform has enough data qualifiers for the data exhange to run in a timely manner?

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: Data qualifiers only provide a portion of the data rating. Rating is a combination of algorithms and that help us determine the validity of the data we collect. Qualification adds a secondary layer of assurance and creates insights into the data we could not have foreseen by using AI alone.

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: HARA is employing field officers to assist farmers in registering their profiles, and continuously collecting agriculture data throughout the farming cycle of cultivation, harvest, and post-harvest seasons. Smart contracts award tokens to these data providers in the form of loyalty points, and the farmers can collect incentives (such as discounts on fertilizers and seeds) through local partners also in the HARA ecosystem.  Aside from the mobile app, HARA has also a web portal that enables them to supply data.

Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: A HARA Field Agent, not just farmers themselves, and can eventually earn a salary of up to $700 dollars per month!  Field Agents are our bridge to the farmers in the field. They are critical for the early success of the HARA platform. In their initial role, Field Agents will serve as data collectors and map out the agricultural potential in their village. For example, they will check the familial relations and ID‚Äôs of local farmers, examine the yields of their crops, and track the market prices.

Author: SHIBAINU21
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: How to data qualifiers check the data of the farmers?

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: Data qualification method is in the form of proof of work. This can be with image recognition, by providing photographic proof of the requested items, or through simple questions related to the data that was uploaded to the exchange.

Author: SHIBAINU21
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: How do they make sure they're getting good data quality before selling the data?

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: HARA is implementing a qualification mechanism to drive the accurate rating of data. Any data submitted on the exchange must earn a minimum basic rating before any exchange can occur. This adds a secondary level of information aggregation to allow for dynamic forecasting. Data providers can allocate more token in order to drive more qualifications, thereby increasing its rating.

Author: SHIBAINU21
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: Ohhh okay but who checks the work of the data qualifiers?

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: Data qualifiers can also rate other data qualifiers part of a data qualifier‚Äôs rating comes from qualifying other data qualifiers in order to ensure high-quality data is being submitted. The tokens for rating qualifiers are initially taken from HARA seeding fund then funded by a portion of the proceeds from the ongoing transactions. This acts as a self-regulating mechanism to ensure that data qualifiers are providing accurate data and to avoid data qualifiers gaming the system. The rating that data qualifiers received enables them to have access to better tiers of mini tasks and automatically increase their credibility.

Author: DRStrange1
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: How can financial services utilize HARA platform?

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: With HARA data exchange platform, our financial services can utilize it to access data that will measure growth potentials in agriculture and food sector, and provide insights into an untapped customer base. This data can also be utilized to help them expand their business opportunities by formulating credit scoring or risk profiling, getting access to the untapped segments, calculating insurance premiums with better risks prediction, and by facilitating the implementation of mobile banking to provide low-cost banking service. These are the potential data usage for the financial services in HARA ecosystem.

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: HARA Data Exchange platform MVP will be launched on the first quarter of 2019.

Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: HARA has a total addressable market The markets that HARA will focus on are developing countries located near the equator, characterized by long growing periods (many are year-round), and where access to mobile phone service is available. Dattabot has identified eight ( countries that possess these attributes, where collectively, these countries represent nearly one-third of all smallholder farmers in the world, which are: Bangladesh, Indonesia, Vietnam, Thailand, Kenya, Uganda, Mexico, and Peru

Author: AsleepControl
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: Looks like a great addition to HARA Team!

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: They are Indeed a great addition to our team!   Charles Pyo is a Korean technology entrepreneur and blockchain evangelist. He is the CEO and founder of Chain Partners, the first blockchain company builder in Korea that has numerous subsidiaries operating in every core area of the blockchain world.  Darius Rugevicius is the Managing Partner at Connect Capital, a blockchain and digital assets investment fund that takes a venture capitalist approach. The company aims to link industry pioneers and prosperous advocates by providing a platform that thrives through its strong network and dedication to accelerating success.  Hendy Setiono is the founder and CEO of Baba Rafi Enterprise, a holding company consisting of various award-winning local food brands.  Mr. Setiono founded the company at the young age of 19, opening the first outlet of Kebab Turki Baba Rafi with starting capital borrowed from his family. Since then, the company has experienced a rapid growth both domestically and internationally to over a thousand different outlets.  With his vast knowledge of the investment landscape in Indonesia and Southeast Asia, Mr. Setiono will assist the growth of HARA by facilitating the outreach to new stakeholders.

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: HARA needs to be implemented by using a proven technology that's why the decision to use Ethereum was made. Also, Ethereum has the biggest dApps projects connection support to other layers through Oraclize, Infura, and so forth. It also has the most robust community and developer support. HARA is not closing its doors to other blockchain tech, that's why HARA is also exploring research and development partnerships with other blockchain tech companies.

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: Data qualifiers receive HART tokens when they perform basic tasks of verifying the quality of data and help increase its rating  Data qualifiers add value to the ecosystem by providing verification in the form of proof of work. They act as a crowd-sourced indicator of data quality, which over time, will help improve the overall robustness of the data and help generate healthy, ongoing demand. Data qualifiers will receive tokens based on their efforts related to the tasks they perform in verifying data on the exchange. Data qualifiers can be any HARA token holders.

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: Do you know how HARA will help better food prices?  Farmers are struggling with getting a good price for their yields. The price for their goods fluctuates enormously, and sometimes even a single hour could see the price drop from reasonable to outright bad. With this, farmers can use HARA as a business management tool to help them gauge the prices that they are offering for their yields depending on the price that the people are offering. They could then make an informed decision on whether to sell to a distributor (buyer) or directly to the general market. If they decide to sell to the general market, it would eliminate the mark-up prices of the distributors thus, resulting in cheaper products and eliminating the farmer's reliance on distributors without paying their fees or "cut".  As a form of insurance, the farmers have a homegrown insurance system called the multi-crop system. This system is where the farmers plant multiple crops at the same time and just in case a certain crop's price fluctuates they would have some type of fallback. Chilies seem to be the most common secondary crop that farmers grow since spicy food is very common in  Indonesia. However, the farmers admitted that there is no real plan in going into what crops they plant.  HARA could assist the farmers by providing transparent market information. Proving this transparency could help stabilize prices on the market and give the farmer a better insight of what they‚Äôll be earning. HARA also identified hydroponic farmers  that grow plants without the need for soil, instead they use an enriched mineral solution. There is a big difference between hydroponic farmers and regular farmers wherein the hydroponic farmers know exactly what nutrients are needed to optimize the growth of their plants, and thus calculate the estimate for their profits. On the other hand, the regular farmers mostly just guess.  The data collected in the HARA data exchange platform can be used to share knowledge and to educate farmers that will improve their bottom lines, therefore they can save money by not unnecessarily overusing farm input materials like fertilizer.   Join us in our Telegram Community for more news and updates

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: To have sustainable agriculture we need to increase production, create more job opportunities, and preserve natural resources. Because aren‚Äôt we all dependent on this massive industry?

Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: In its second annual publication, Badan Ekonomi Kreatif RI published new insights in relation to the growing creative economy in Indonesia. HARA was honored to contribute its research to the report and describe the great potential blockchain has in this sector. Problems like massive piracy infringement, expensive intermediaries, and unfair income distribution are roadblocks that keep Indonesia‚Äôs creative players from reaching their full potential. These problems can all be addressed by utilizing the inherent qualities of blockchain technology.  Find out more about how we see blockchain changing the creative economy sector in the near future here: http://bit.ly/2AkKpmL

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: in developing countries where critical agricultural data is more difficult to find, having a decentralized data exchange platform will solve the painful problems of data asymmetry. Access to the market and agricultural data remains a key challenge for farmers in these countries and will push the adoption of HARA platform. Starting from the needs of financial inclusions enabled by the financial institutions, to food traceability, precision agriculture, logistics, supply chain, and general marketplace.

Author: alexandrea
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: Can anyone be able to buy your data? and how will they purchase it?

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: In this scenario, a company, NGO, government institution, or even an individual can contribute tokens to get access to raw data sets from HARA. These data buyers will input a search query using parameters and filters provided in the HARA ecosystem, concentrated around the agricultural and food sector data.  When buyers access data, they can do so directly with tokens or go through a network operator using local currency. The network operator will find the best exchange price and make the transaction seamless for the buyer.

Author: alexandrea
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: How do you make sure that data buyers are getting quality data and getting their money's worth?

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: Hara has a data qualification mechanism to ensure the accurate rating of data. Any data submitted on the exchange must earn a minimum basic rating before any exchange can occur. This adds a secondary level of information aggregation to allow for dynamic forecasting. Data providers can allocate more token in order to drive more qualifications, thereby increasing its rating.  Data qualification method will be gamified in various ways, such as: ‚Ä¢ Swiping for image recognition or confirmation ‚Ä¢ Providing photographic proof of requested items ‚Ä¢ Answering questions related to the data   part of a data qualifier‚Äôs rating comes from qualifying other data qualifiers in order to ensure high-quality data is being submitted. The tokens for rating qualifiers are initially taken from HARA seeding fund then funded by a portion of the proceeds from the ongoing transactions. This acts as a self-regulating mechanism to ensure that data qualifiers are providing accurate data and to avoid data qualifiers gaming the system. The rating that data qualifiers received enables them to have access to better tiers of mini tasks and automatically increase their credibility.

Author: cassidyyy
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: Just curious, how do you choose on which country to introduce Hara? like what parameters do you look for.

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: HARA has 3 parameters to choose, and asses our Total Addressable Marketplace  1. We analyze the country's scope and the data in the Agricultural and Food sector. We check the country's total population, production value, total agriculture workers, total land area, and percentage of agricultural land area.  2. We check the country's Internet and Mobile penetration. Internet and mobile penetration are the most important factors to ensure the penetration of HARA platform. Our target countries should have a very high population and should have a relatively high internet penetration rate.  3. We look at the country's financial services, and banking reach. The development of agriculture and the food sector requires financial services to support the bigger investment of agriculture-related infrastructure and other production-related resources. Thus, it is important to have an overview of the financial service industries and its potentials in the target countries. Despite the potentials of banking reach, microfinance institutions are still the key to improve financial access to agriculture workers in developing countries, given its advantage in proximity to the customers and its frequent association with more cooperative financing approaches.  To conclude, our initial target is developing countries where agriculture has been vital to the country‚Äôs economic development. Agricultural land occupies a large percentage of total land area and has been one of the main sources of employment. These countries should also have high internet and mobile penetration rate, which are requisite for the adoption of HARA platform. In addition, a combination of highly mobile and banking/microfinance institutions reach increases the potentials for HARA and its incentive system to be accepted by farmers as data providers.

Author: alexandrea
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: Is it the same with the Data providers?

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: Small Holder Farmers, Agritech Companies,  IoT Companies can be data providers.  Smallholder farmers use the HARA platform with the expectation of receiving multiple benefits from the various value-added providers in the ecosystem. By being a part of HARA, they gain access to many benefits.  Businesses operating in the realm of agriculture, food, supply-chain and technology industries are rewarded in the HARA ecosystem for sharing their data sets on the exchange. The HARA suite of applications includes a variety of apps for companies to upload data onto the HARA data exchange platform. To simplify the token acquisition process, we are providing an entity called a ‚ÄòNetwork Operator‚Äô, which maintains a reserve of HARA tokens. When data is transacted, these companies will receive proceeds in the form of tokens and can choose to convert them into local currency using a network operator.  Data providers have to use HARA Token to be listed on the exchange. A portion of those tokens is allocated to receive a basic rating and compensate for the work that goes into validating their data. Data providers that get their data qualified by more qualifiers will receive higher ratings, which will increase credibility compared to other datasets listed on the HARA decentralized data exchange.

Author: orange_marmalade
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: What kind of data do u exactly need from farmers?

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: The HARA ecosystem needs farmer related data and metadata.  For the Farmer related data, we need their Farmer Data, Commodity Data, and Field Ownership Data  Their metadata's are Farmer Data - Farmer's ID, Farmer's Profile, Profile Photo, Selfie with ID, Birthdate, Address  Commodity Data - Name  Field ownership Data - Farmer, Field, Ownership Status, Validity Status  We also acquire:  Cultivation Data, which are Farmer Input Data, Harvest Data, Planting Data, Disease Data, Pest Data.  Ecological Data, which are Disease Data, Pest Data, Soil Data,  Weather Data.  Location Specific Data, which are  Field Data, and Field Ownership Data.

Author: orange_marmalade
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: The field agents will then be promoted to farm managers right? and their pay will increase?

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: For a field agent to be eligible to be promoted to a Farm Manager will depend on his local network and the quality and the quantity of work he or she has done. The farm manager will serve as a bridge between the farmers and the services they would like access to like loans, insurance etc. The Farm Manager can also act as an agronomist and translate the data from HARA to the farmers and therefore improve their yield and business practices. The Farm Manager could also act as a sales agent and help the farmers buy the necessary farming inputs to avoid overspending, they can also help farmers sell their yield and monitor loan disbursements. For all this work, the Farm Manager will assume a small portion of the sale, the portion can be calculated by the number of farmers, times the potential harvest, times the net margin per kilogram of the harvest.

Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: For now, our farmers can only covert their Loyalty Points to goods like seeds, fertilizers, phone credits, and etc. We will work with more partners in the future so that farmers will have a wide variety of items that they can choose to redeem their points with. We've partnered with PundiX to achieve such goal. The XPOS system will be integrated into the global network of HARA partner kiosks to help farmers and other stakeholders of the HARA ecosystem redeem farming needs such as seeds, fertilizer, as well as daily necessities like cooking oil, phone credit etc. Initially, the XPOS devices will be deployed across the Indonesian villages at an approximate density of one device for every 200 farmers in participating areas. Read more about our partnership here.

Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: A personal note from our CEO, Regi Wahyu  Our Product & Partnership Focus During the last few months, we have announced many new strategic partnerships for HARA. As a result, we have now been given aggressive project timelines by our partners. Our team now needs to immediately work on product integrations and deployment with one of Indonesia‚Äôs largest banks and PundiX, a leading point-of-sales solution that helps bring crypto to the masses. This momentum along with Dr. Werner Vogels‚Ää‚Äî‚ÄäCTO Amazon.com‚Äôs vocal endorsement of HARA has also been attracting partnership opportunities globally. This opens up development and growth opportunities for the HARA ecosystem.  We have decided to really focus on this product integration with our partners and to move our public sale stage of our Initial Token Sale to January 2019.  All of our team‚Äôs efforts are to ensure the successful delivery of product and deployment and to explore the global interest.  New Date for Public Sale: January 21, 2019, 9AM GMT+7‚Ää‚Äî‚ÄäJanuary 30, 2019 9AM GMT+7  We believe that this decision will benefit the entire HARA ecosystem and all token holders.  The HARA team and I would again like to thank everyone who has contributed up to this stage. Please follow us on Telegram and Twitter for the latest product and partnership news.  Regards,  Regi

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: Thank you for the support. Our Public sale will be on November 13-30 with a minimum contribution of .5ETH. HARA will use the proceeds raised from the Initial Token Sale to continue building data exchange platform and to grow and expand the HARA Ecosystem. This includes the Deployment/Acquisition which covers the deployment and acquisition costs of engaging and onboarding data providers and buyers at scale. Product Development for the cost of developing HARA blockchain data exchange and related services, including but not limited to, the creation of the blockchain and platform infrastructure, machine learning algorithms, and smart contracts. Business Development that covers the expansion of HARA across Southeast Asia and globally, with focus on countries on the equator line. This includes the cost of entering and establishing operations in new markets. Operations covers operating expenses required to scale up the HARA business, including fees for external consultants such as legal and accounting. Lastly, for funds for contingency reserve.  You can check ourwhitepaper to know more about our budget allocation.

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: Need more reason to buy HART?     Here's a very good use case of HARA! This article features a story of a farmer that our field agents met in Tojo Una-Una Regency, Central Celebes. The farmers there mostly grow their corn with the intention of selling it as animal feed. Although they produce a high quality of kernel, the overall total yield was quite low! This is because of the practice of seed replanting. The original seed is not designed to have its offspring planted in the next season. The farmer is well aware of this, she simply does not have a choice due to capital limitation.  This problem will continue unless they have an access to a source of capital that won‚Äôt tie them to an unfair price of their yield.  That is where HARA can make a change. HARA collects the data that allows farmers to apply for microcredit loans. With access to these loans, farmers will be able to drastically increase their yield and consequently, their income. Through a bit of data, HARA helps smallholder farmers make a big improvement. üë®üèª‚Äçüåæ‚ù§Ô∏è  Read the whole article How a bit of data can have a big impact.  Join our Pre-sale now on Tokenomy Launchpad and Liquid ICO Market!

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: Watch the HARA Ecosystem come alive  The HARA Ecosystem might look a bit abstract when you read our whitepaper. You might still be a bit unsure how exactly the ecosystem is put into practice. How do we attract more farmers? Who qualify the data? How do the incentives work?  To help answer all these questions, we went into the field to create a video that shows how our ecosystem directly benefits the farmers and their community. The video walks you through the process all the way from the HARA field agents approaching new farmers, to the families redeeming their points.  Drop us a comment to let us know what you think! Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: Pundi X has teamed up with HARA in a new partnership to promote financial inclusion and bring digital payments to an untapped market of smallholder farmers in rural Indonesia. This is the first time Pundi X has ever endorsed a token sale and the company‚Äôs first ever product partnership in Indonesia.  HARA and Pundi X will collaborate to roll out the deployment of thousands of blockchain-based point of sales (‚ÄúPOS‚Äù) devices to the HARA ecosystem to facilitate data collection and financial inclusion across developing economies.  The XPOS system will be integrated into the global network of HARA partner kiosks to help farmers and other stakeholders of the HARA ecosystem redeem farming needs such as seeds, fertilizer, as well as daily necessities like cooking oil, phone credit etc.  In addition to the partnership, the president of Pundi X, Constantin Papadimitriou, will join HARA as an advisor. Before joining Pundi X, Papadimitriou accumulated over 17 years‚Äô experience as founding CEO of two Indonesian fintech companies.Join our community on Telegram! Join our community us on Telegram for more updates!

Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: HARA is proud to announce a new partnership with Haluan Rekadaya Konsultindo (HRK). HRK is focused on coming up with innovative, cost-effective solutions for problems in the Small and Medium Business (SMB) and Plantation industries.  HRK positions itself as a Value Added Service in the HARA Ecosystem. HRK has developed the CRoPS Application, which is aimed at the agriculture sector. The application features modules that help to optimize the plantation business operations. In turn, HRK will benefit from the data that HARA makes available to complement their offerings. (l-r) Sutan Simandjuntak (HRK), Regi Wahyu (HARA), Thomas Susmantoro (HRK), Imron Zuhri (HARA)  The collaboration will allow HARA and HRK to jointly assess business challenges in the industry and rapidly come up with fitting solutions by leveraging the technology both parties bring to the table. Both companies can prevent unnecessarily spending resources on tackling the same issues and potentially even jointly develop improved solutions. For example, the data collected by HARA on the HARA Data Exchange could be used to optimize business practices and lead to new insights that can be incorporated into HRK‚Äôs solutions.  HARA is excited to welcome HRK into our network of partners. We look forward to working together in developing new and improved solutions for issues at play in the agriculture industry to create a real social impact. **  The HARA Token Pre-sale is now open! You can join the sale through the Liquid ICO Market or the Tokenomy Launchpad.

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: Engaging cloud computing and Blockchain Technology to help rice scientists and farmers   Werner Vogels, Amazon Vice-President and Chief Technology Officer  Amazon Vice-President and Chief Technology Officer Werner Vogels shared his unique perspective on how advanced technology capabilities can help support not just rice research, but even smallholder farmers during his keynote presentation at the 5th International Rice Congress last October 16, 2018, in Singapore.  In 2006, Amazon pioneered cloud computing where data is stored, managed, and processed using a network of remote servers hosted on the Internet rather than in local servers or personal computers. Today, millions of business around the world use Amazon Web Services (AWS). An increasing number of non-profit and research organizations are also using the platform to do complex data research  Dr. Vogels cited HARA Token, a tech startup in Indonesia that Amazon supports, as an example.  Read the whole IRRI article here and join us on our Telegram for more updates.

Body: We are happy to announce that HARA has joined the Trace Alliance. The Trace Alliance is a non-profit association which connects companies and other parties that do research and create practical solutions related to the field of blockchain technology. The alliance is mainly focused on achieving increased supply chain integrity, data governance, transparency, and trust. Other members of the trace alliance include Deloitte, TMA Solutions, and Gijima, among many others.  Through its membership in the Trace Alliance, HARA will have the opportunity to actively engage with and share experiences with other like-minded companies that are aimed at tackling similar challenges. The collaboration will bring us another step closer towards a fully transparent future in which we are able to empower millions through data!  *** The HARA Token Pre-sale is now open! Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: Out of a total of 127 applicants, HARA was one of only twenty top start-up invited to present their ideas at the Rabobank Food Loss Challenge Asia Pitch Day.  The Food Loss Challenge Asia is an initiative by Rabobank that aims to look for solutions to address the global problem of food loss. At the Pitch Day event, start-ups from all over Asia pitched their ideas to reduce food loss to food and agriculture industry leaders and investors.  HARA Head of Partnerships, Ren√©e Corstens, explained how HARA will attempt to solve this problem through our blockchain-powered data exchange ecosystem. Working together with others that have the same mindset is something HARA is very proud of. Our ever growing network of partnerships will only help us reach more people as we work to creating a real social impact.  HARA would like to thank the Rabobank Foundation for the invitation to come and present our ideas at the Food Loss Challenge Asia Pitch Day, and we look forward to exploring any opportunities that resulted from it! Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: HARA was invited to the main stage twice at the Tech in Asia Jakarta 2018 conference. The Tech in Asia conference series was designed to help build and serve the tech community and has grown to become one of the largest in Asia.  The event was held at the Jakarta Convention Center and was expected to attract a crowd of over 5000 entrepreneurs, corporates, VCs, developers, and media. Our Head of Business Development, Larissa Sidarto, moderated a session on the current opportunities and challenges faced by the AgriTech industry. Meanwhile, our CEO Regi Wahyu discussed blockchain innovation in Southeast Asia with Juzar Motiwalla, chairman of Zilliqa. During the panel, Wahyu and Zilliqa spoke about how their companies implement blockchain technology. Wahyu explained that there is a real need for the data that HARA collects because nobody knows exactly what the current state of the agriculture sector in Indonesia is today. He mentioned facing tough challenges. Wahyu‚Äôs first words to his team were very clear: we are at war.  He meant that HARA is at war with the large number of scams that are floating around in the sector, that HARA is competing for the small amount of real talent that is available, and that HARA is fighting the idea that you cannot change the bottom of the pyramid using advanced technology. **  The HARA Token Pre-sale is now open! You can join the sale through the Liquid ICO Market or the Tokenomy Launchpad. For more details, click here.

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: Let's see how better data can lead to better prices  While our deployment specialists are collecting the data of the locals, they found out that the farmer's struggle is getting a good price for their yield. The farmers expressed an interest in using HARA as a business management tool, to help them gauge the prices people are offering for their produce. Depending on the price, they could then make an informed decision to either sell to the off-taker or directly to the market.  An alternative solution that the farmers use is called multi-crop system. In this system, the farmers plant different types of produce at the same time. That way they at least have something else to fall back on, if the price of one crop turns out to be terrible. However, the farmers admitted that there is no real plan going into what crops they plant. Often they just randomly choose something. In this way, the multi-crop solution serves as a sort of home-grown insurance protecting the farmers from bad prices.    HARA could assist the farmers by providing transparent market information. The data collected on the HARA data-exchange can be used to share knowledge and educate farmers to help improve their bottom lines. For example, by helping farmers to refine their farming practices, they can save money by not unnecessarily overusing farm input materials like fertilizer.  In the deployment partnership, HARA assisted with collecting the data of around 300 farmers to help them apply for the KUR microcredit. While the hydroponic farmers are already inspiring the other farmers with their results, becoming a hydroponic farmer themselves does require a big investment. This is where microloans like the KUR could help out.  ** The HARA Token Pre-sale is now open! You can join the sale through the Liquid ICO Market or the Tokenomy Launchpad. For more details, click here.

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: One of our use cases is our partnership for Rural Economic Development to improve market access of smallholder farmers with PRISMA (Promoting Rural Income through Support for Markets in Agriculture), a multi-year program under the AIP-Rural which works to help spur growth in the agricultural value chain. PRISMA was designed to increase the competitiveness of poor farmers by giving them access to private and public services.  The program supports the AIP-Rural‚Äôs goal of contributing to increasing the net incomes of thousands of smallholder farmers in eastern Indonesia. PRISMA will create engagement with other agriculture stakeholders, like financial institutions and design and validate data collection models.  Meanwhile, HARA helps PRISMA to design and execute their development programs. Together, PRISMA and HARA collected 1500 farmers and HARA could provide agriculture information in a specific region for related stakeholders, such as financial institutions, input suppliers, and off-takers.  You can read more about HARA and PRISMA partnership here. Visit our website to whitelist yourself and visit HARA.ag to get more use cases of HARA. Thanks!

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: Smallholder farmers are farmers that grow their crops on a small plot of land, typically no larger than 2 hectares in size. They typically earn at or below the poverty levels in their home countries and generally have minimal access to modern farming techniques, agricultural data, or market information. In short, these are the people for which HARA could really make a difference.  Smallholder farmers are incentivized to input their data in exchange for loyalty points. The loyalty points that farmers earn can then be exchanged for a variety of goods and services at designated kiosks. For example, farmers can use the points to get discounts on agriculture products, phone credits, or school supplies. Furthermore, the farmers will be able to get access to market information and financial services, as well as get access to precision farming advice which could help them attain greater yields.  Visit our website to get more information about HARA.

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: How does HARA helps banks help farmers?  Financial institutions and companies operating in the blockchain sphere are often portrayed pitted against each other as mortal enemies. But HARA is proving that a mutual cooperation can be in everyone‚Äôs best interest‚Ää‚Äî‚Ääincluding the people both HARA and banks try to reach.  There is a lot of demand for microcredit in Indonesia. Through companies like HARA, banks get easy access to a lucrative untapped market. The involvement of HARA also means that a new influx of capital and confidence in the world of the blockchain, which is especially important in a bear market.  Currently, HARA is partnered directly with BNI and is working together with BTPN through a different partnership. Both banks have been able to disburse the KUR microcredit at an unprecedented rate. In the virtuous ecosystem that HARA creates, everybody profits.  Visit our website to know more about HARA!

Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: The HARA ecosystem helps BNI to disburse the microcredit loans or the Kredit Usaha Rakyat (KUR) to the smallholder farmers. To grant microcredit loans, BNI needs data from the farmers ranging from their ID to the land they own and what crops they plant. However, getting this information has sometimes proven difficult. Therefore, BNI and HARA are collaborating to speed up this process. HARA‚Äôs data collection model helps ease the administrative process for the loan applications. The data gathered in the HARA data exchange will equip BNI with the relevant information for risk analysis in the loan approval process. BNI is one of the stakeholders in the HARA data exchange ecosystem as data buyer.  Here's an article about the partnership of HARA and BNI to supplement that. Visit our website to get more information.

Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: HARA continues its expansion to the world's most socially impactful sectors by partnering with TeleCTG!  TeleCTG is a medical technology start-up from Indonesia, which has developed a simplified, portable, and cost-effective cardiotocography (CTG) device. A CTG device is used to record the fetal heartbeat and the uterine contractions during pregnancy.  Both HARA and TeleCTG target to assist a part of the population that does not currently have access to the tools needed to improve their lives. These people need both HARA‚Äôs and TeleCTG‚Äôs help, resulting in a natural fit for a partnership.  HARA is excited to have found a partner in TeleCTG and expand our operations to the healthcare sector. It is the first step we make outside of the agriculture sector, and we are glad to have an innovative company like TeleCTG by our side to help improve the lives of millions.  Read more about this partnership in our Medium.

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: How does HARA help financial institutions such as banks in helping farmers?  There is a lot of demand for microcredit in Indonesia. The most prolific form of this microcredit is the Kredit Usaha Rakyat (KUR). The KUR is a state-sponsored credit or investment financing scheme specifically dedicated to micro, small, and medium enterprises (MSMEs), which are unable to meet certain requirements set by banks for regular loans. For banks, actually disbursing the microcredit is often problematic.  millions of these Indonesians are basically immediately disqualified when applying for microcredit. Apart from often lacking proper documentation, they are generally considered too risky for loans or simply live in locations too remote for formal financial services.  Banks need partners that help them streamline the KUR disbursement. Apart from making sure that people do not fall victim to black market lenders, it is also in the banks own the best interest to issue KUR in a quick and reliable way as it can be highly lucrative. This is where blockchain companies like HARA come in. HARA helps both the banks and the MSMEs to profit off of each other. HARA also unlocks access to financial institutions for the MSMEs, like smallholder farmers. Apart from earning an extra income through the HARA ecosystem, this also prevents them from having to approach black market lenders.  Through companies like HARA, banks get easy access to a lucrative untapped market. The involvement of HARA also means that a new influx of capital and confidence in the world of the blockchain, which is especially important in a bear market.  Currently, HARA is partnered directly with BNI and is working together with BTPN through a different partnership. Both banks have been able to disburse the KUR microcredit at an unprecedented rate. In the virtuous ecosystem that HARA creates, everybody profits.  Visit our website to know more about HARA!

Author: alexandrea
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: What is BNI? How will BNI benefit from HARA and how will BNI help HARA?

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: Bank Negara Indonesia is one of the banks that the Indonesian government appointed to disburse the microcredit Kredit Usaha Rakyat (KUR) to smallholder farmers. The KUR is a subsidized microcredit and is one of the national economic initiatives aimed at improving access to finance for micro to medium enterprises in Indonesia. To grant microcredit loans, BNI needs data from the farmers ranging from their ID to the land they own and what crops they plant. However, getting this information has sometimes proven difficult. Therefore, BNI and HARA are collaborating to speed up this process.  BNI will benefit from HARA in two ways.  The data that HARA provides will make the data collection process a lot faster, as the bank will only need to do sampling from the data instead of collecting it all themselves and HARA‚Äôs data collection model helps ease the administrative process for the loan applications.  On the other hand, BNI helps HARA to improve access to loans for smallholder farmer. The first phase of HARA‚Äôs pilot project already resulted in 90 loan applications from 2 villages in East Java BNI is also a Data buyer in the HARA Ecosystem.  Join us in our Telegram to get more updates!

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: HARA continues expansion to the world‚Äôs most socially impactful sectors by partnering with TeleCTG  We are pleased to announce that HARA has found a new partner in TeleCTG. Our partnership with TeleCTG is one of the first steps in our plan of expanding into the world‚Äôs most socially impactful sectors. These are the sectors in which we can really make a difference.  TeleCTG is a medical technology start-up from Indonesia, which has developed a simplified, portable, and cost-effective cardiotocography (CTG) device. A CTG device is used to record the fetal heartbeat and the uterine contractions during pregnancy.  The work we will do together will assist in answering the challenges faced by the healthcare and agriculture sectors in rural areas. Both HARA and TeleCTG target to assist a part of the population that does not currently have access to the tools needed to improve their lives. These people need both HARA‚Äôs and TeleCTG‚Äôs help, resulting in a natural fit for a partnership.  HARA is excited to have found a partner in TeleCTG and expand our operations to the healthcare sector. It is the first step we make outside of the agriculture sector, and we are glad to have an innovative company like TeleCTG by our side to help improve the lives of millions.  Join us in our community on Telegram!

Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: HARA‚Äôs parent company Dattabot was honored with one of the ‚Äú30 Most Promising Growth-stage Startups‚Äù awards at the Forbes Indonesia's Digital Conference 2018. Apart from this award, HARA also secured a nomination for the Innovator award.  Forbes Indonesia‚Äôs Digital Conference 2018 was an international event aimed at helping growth-stage startups become the next unicorn, a startup company with a value of over $1 billion. The conference also served as a venue for corporations to look into digital transformation and meet with entrepreneurs in the technology sector.  ‚ÄúI feel very blessed that Dattabot‚Äôs HARA Project was awarded a ‚Äô30 Promising Growth-stage Startups‚Äù award, and that we were chosen as one of the nominees of the Innovator award. The appreciation from Forbes Magazine and the belief it expresses in our mission reaffirms that we are on the right track to deliver a positive impact on society,‚Äù Regi Wahyu on receiving the award.  Regi also participated in the last session of the event, What‚Äôs Next and Beyond, in which the focus was on how technology will influence future development. Regi briefly presented the product that HARA is building and how it is set to transform the agriculture sector through the use of blockchain technology.  ‚ÄúThe reason why Dattabot decided to go into agriculture is that this sector has never been touched by this technology in developing countries. In America, they can do precision agriculture because the farmland is wide open, not like Indonesia. I am really excited to see how technology as advances as blockchain can really disrupt these sectors. This is something where nobody so far has been willing to do the dirty work.‚Äù  Read more here. Join us on Telegram for more updates.

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: Good questions! Yes, HARA field agents are based in Indonesia for our initial deployments and pilot projects. They are young farmers and other young people from the local villages that are interested in agriculture. We train them to be able to assist the farmers in providing their data. If we will be deploying HARA in other countries, we will also be training field agents from that country for them to be able to easily facilitate the data collection process and have a close interaction with the farmers and rural communities.  But for now, HARA is focused on developing further the project with its initial deployment in Indonesia but, HARA is also open for partnerships outside of Indonesia like our partnership with African Business Institute in Lilongwe, Malawi and Kampala, Uganda.  You can read our whitepaper to see our roadmap. Also, live chat with us on Telegram.

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: Is Blockchain the Future of Indonesian Farming?  In the agricultural sector, HARA Token wants to use critical information like soil quality, grain price, and land ownership from farmers and field agents to help Indonesian farmers increase annual yields. The country is fertile ground for rice production, but the entire industry is plagued by a series of entrenched problems, from poor land use practices to shady middlemen. It's a highly fragmented, shadowy supply chain that could seriously benefit from some sunshine.  Farmers who input this data into the Blockchain will be rewarded with HARA Tokens, which can be exchanged for needed goods like fertilizer. In the end, it could help make farmers more plugged-in and knowledgeable about prices, sales, and best practices. And for NGOs and government institutions, it creates a valuable data set that shows what's happening in the rice sector in real time.  Read more about HARA Token featured in VICE.

Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: HEXA Agro is a wholesaler of agricultural products. It functions as the off-taker in a closed loop farming ecosystem that they themselves established in the Tojo Una-Una Regency, Central Sulawesi. The ecosystem ensures a fair price for the farmers‚Äô yield while helping them get access to the microcredit Kredit Usaha Rakyat (KUR) to support their business.  Getting access to microcredit can help the smallholder farmers increase their farm output immensely, as they will be able to invest in better seeds. On the other hand, in order for banks to extend the KUR microcredit, data is required about both the farmers and their farms. In the collaboration between HARA and HEXA Agro, HARA got farmers and field data to help Bank BNI, which is also part of the HEXA ecosystem, to disburse the KUR microcredit to a local farmer.  HEXA as an off-taker will be able to see the potential of the yield in the upcoming season using HARA. HARA will also help HEXA to supervise its farmers based on the data that HARA collects from them.  You can read this article to give you more idea about this partnership.

Body: For the month of September, we welcomed two additional members of our Board of Advisors.  Dr. Yos Ginting is a blockchain promoter in the service industry. Ginting will assist in the growth of HARA with his expertise in outreach activities. As an advisor, he will mostly focus on helping build the HARA community and engage with blockchain and agriculture industry experts and business leaders. Koji Shima is the CEO of Paw Mark Japan, and President Commissioner of PT Amalgamated Tricor. Shima has over 30 years of experience in international trade, retail sales, and investments in America, Europe, and Southeast Asia. With his investment experience around the world, Shima advises HARA Token how to approach new investors in the blockchain world.  Read more about here. To see the full list of our advisors, read our whitepaper.
