Author: cassidyyy
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: How can you make sure that the platform has enough data qualifiers for the data exchange to run in a timely manner?

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: Data qualifiers add value to the HARA ecosystem by providing verification in the form of proof of work. They act as a crowd-sourced indicator of data quality, which over time, will help improve the overall robustness of the data and help generate healthy, ongoing demand. Data qualifiers will receive tokens based on their efforts related to the tasks they perform in verifying data on the exchange. They only provide a portion of the data rating which is a combination of algorithms and that help us determine the validity of the data we collect. Qualification adds a secondary layer of assurance and creates insights into the data we could not have foreseen by using Artificial Intelligence alone.  You can read more about this in our whitepaper. Also, visit our website for more information.

Author: 97bj91
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: What is the relationship of HARA Token and Dattabot? Are they the same company?

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: No, they are not.  Dattabot is an Indonesian Big Data Analytics company with a focus on data integration. The founders and team behind it are also the ones who created HARA data exchange for agriculture and food sector. Coming from Indonesia, we understand the economic and informational inequalities suffered by those living in the digitally excluded world.  Dattabot is focused on solving large societal problems. Thus, HARA‚Äôs decentralized data exchange and ecosystem which will support better data-driven decisions for data buyers and incentivize data providers to share their data. It is the dream to create a virtuous cycle that could help all users to fully embrace the opportunities in this new era of data,  For more information about the project, you can join our Telegram Community. Thanks!

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: Data empowers billions. It levels the playing field for all players. With a traceable and transparent data exchange, we are no longer losing valuable data. All players, large and small, including smallholder farmers or local shop owners, will be able to access data we generate daily. HARA token economics will reinforce a virtuous cycle that continues to grow. Beginning with the food sector, HARA will touch up to 1 billion people on the planet. Furthermore, expansion of the value chains of health, education, mobility, and recreation sectors will assure HARA tokens to impact billions of others. HARA is starting that mission today.  Starting with one byte at a time.   Know more about HARA, visit our website and join our Telegram Community.

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: Dr. Muhammad Chatib Basri, the Former Minister of Finance of the Republic of Indonesia, on his appointment on HARA's Board of Advisors.  ‚ÄúThe development of blockchain and digital technology will undoubtedly help us improve the economy by cutting transaction costs, simplifying long processes or red-tape, and making the process become faster. In the future, the availability of data will also enable the creation of personalized products that can be provided en masse at relatively low prices. This means that products or prices can be adjusted to individual tastes. The HARA blockchain will help farmers in the Indonesian agriculture sector increase their productivity, cut the transaction costs, and increase their income. I‚Äôm honored to be part of this adventure as an advisor for HARA.‚Äù  Most of the problems in the agriculture and food sector are data related. Farmers in Indonesia have little to no access to agricultural data and market information that could increase their productivity and reduce their losses. HARA believes that data transparency can solve these problems and that data will become a new commodity in the agricultural sector.  As an economic policy expert, Dr. Basri‚Äôs advice will undoubtedly be of great help in accomplishing HARA‚Äôs mission to empower billions of people around the world. With a team of technology experts and well-known players in the food and agriculture sector, HARA is more than ready to provide its innovative solutions for implementation on the global scale.  Read the whole article here. To see our latest updates on our Technology, visit HARA.ag .

Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: The HARA Ecosystem might look a bit abstract when you read it on whitepaper. You might still be a bit unsure of how exactly the ecosystem is put into practice. How do we attract more farmers? Who qualify the data? How do the incentives work?  To help answer all these questions, we went into the field to create a video that shows how our ecosystem directly benefits the farmers and their community. The video walks you through the process all the way from the HARA field agents approaching new farmers, to the families redeeming their points.  You can watch it here: The HARA Ecosystem

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: Hello, thanks for the feedback about our project. To answer your question, in the HARA ecosystem, a data qualifier can be anyone who holds HARA Token and interacts with the data provider community or transacts with the data providers in the supply chain. Basically, anyone that is able to vouch for a data provider can serve as a data qualifier. Data qualifiers are also incentivized with HARA Token to do their part consistently. You can participate in our data exchange if you want to perform data qualifying such as proof of work.  To learn more about the role of a data qualifier, you can read this article. You can also join us in our Telegram community to get more updates. Thanks!

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: Data buyers including a company, NGO, government institution, or even an individual can contribute tokens to get access to raw data sets from HARA, initially concentrated on agriculture and food sector. For the data that are not yet available, HARA is adding a data seeking program feature that will allow any data buyers to request and fund the acquisition of the specific data in the form of a ‚Äòmini tasks‚Äô. Data providers are crowd-sourced and incentivized to provide the requested data. Through this feature, these ‚Äòmini tasks‚Äô can be pushed out to users and targetted based on GPS, demographic segmentation (e.g. age, gender, location), time, and so forth.  You can read our whitepaper to learn more about our data buyers in the HARA ecosystem. Also, join us in our Telegram to get more updates. Thanks!

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: How a bit of data can make a big impact?  Here's a story of one of the farmers that our team met in August when our team traveled to Tojo Una-Una Regency, in Central Celebes. Our team came across them while they were doing the post-harvest handling of their crops.  Farmers in the region mostly grow their crops, corn, with the intent of selling it for animal feed. The normal process would take around 4 months of planting and another 4 weeks to dry up the corns before harvesting. This process normally would result in a high-quality kernel. However, the overall quality of the farmer's total yield was quite low. This is because the original seed that they planted came from the previous harvest. The seed was not designed to have its offspring planted in the next season.  The quality of the crops decreases significantly when certain seed are reused. The farmer is well aware of this, but they simply do not have a choice due to capital limitation.  This problem would continue unless the farmer can access another resource of capital. That is where HARA can make a change. HARA collects the data that allows farmers to apply for microcredit loans. With access to these loans, farmers will be able to drastically increase their yield and consequently their income.  While our work has just started in Tojo Una-Una, 10 farmers have already been able to get microcredit loans through data collected through the HARA platform. Through a bit of data, HARA helps smallholder farmers make big improvements. This is one way of how HARA will empower billions of smallholder farmers in Indonesia and beyond.

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: AMAZON Vice-President and CTO visits HARA!  The Vice-President and CTO of Amazon, Werner Vogels, joined us at our offices to learn more about HARA. During the visit, Regi Wahyu (HARA CEO) and Imron Zuhri (HARA CTO) explained the concept of HARA, and how our ecosystem works. Amazon Web Services is leveraged extensively to make HARA a success. The cloud services allow our engineers to fully focus on developing our product, instead of having to deal with things like server management.  Following a day in the office, the Amazon CTO joined Wahyu and Zuhri as they made their way to the rice fields near Bogor. He was given a demonstration of how HARA‚Äôs technology is being put into practice to best serve the rural communities of smallholder farmers.  We are honored that such an influential figure in the tech world took an interest in HARA. With the help of AWS, we will continue our efforts to create a real social impact on all smallholder farmers in Indonesia.  You can read more about this here. Also, check our Telegram for more updates.

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: HARA and PRISMA Team up to Improve the Lives of Smallholder Farmers  HARA made a partnership with PRISMA, a multi-year program under the AIP-Rual which works to help spur growth within the agricultural value chain.  Early this year, HARA and PRISMA had an initial collaboration that allowed HARA to collect farmers' and field data. Together, they created a data collection model that is designed to improve the local economies of the rural areas.  PRISMA's expertise and reputation of the HARA team was one of the reasons why the company entered into the partnership. HARA will supply the platfrom onto which the data will be collected from PRISMA's extensive network of stakeholders in the agricuture.  Looking forward to the sucess of the collaboration of these two entities in creating real social impact for smallholder farmers in Indonesia.   Read more here in this article.

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: How HARA can help our business institutions?   HARA's partnership with Bank Negara Indonesia (BNI), the fourth largest bank in Indonesia and is one of the banks that the Indonesian government appointed to disburse the microcredit Kredit Usaha Rakyat (KUR) to smallholder farmers. The KUR is a subsidized microcredit and is one of the national economic initiatives aimed at improving access to finance for small to medium enterprises in Indonesia. In order to grant the microcredit loans, BNI needs data from the farmers ranging from their ID to the land they own and what crops they plant. However, getting this information has sometimes proven difficult.  ‚ÄúIt can take up to one week for manual data acquisition because we have to visit the locations. It can be quicker for locations that are easier to reach, but for ones that are further away and remote, it takes longer to finish.‚Äù Allan Bambang, Branch Manager of BNI in Situbondo.  ‚ÄúBy providing data on the farmers‚Äô identity, HARA basically helps BNI to the data they need to provide microcredits. Before, they only have data from the government, which is neither sufficient nor reliable in these remote areas.‚Äù Lisa Irawati, Head of Operations at HARA  HARA‚Äôs data collection model helps ease the administrative process for the loan applications. The data gathered in the HARA data exchange will equip BNI with the relevant information for risk analysis in the loan approval process.  Read more about this partnership here.

Author: anastasia.graciaa
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: Thanks for the reply! By the way, I read the whitepaper. It says there that there is a staking balance, how much is the minimum staked balance for me to maintain and access the platform? What will happen if I go below the maintaining balance? Just curious

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: Thanks for asking that. In order to maintain their accounts and get access to the platform, stakeholders need to have a minimum staked balance. The minimum balance allows them to receive push notifications on any activities in the platform. Each notification will reduce their staked token balance. Notifications can be customized to allow stakeholders to choose what they want to receive, including relevant bounties, solicitations, and data set updates. Once the staking balance is below the minimum level, the account goes dormant. The account will be given a grace period and then ultimately will be frozen if no more activity is recorded. This allows the platform to differentiate between active and dormant accounts. The minimum staked balance will change depending on the overall usage of the platform and will fluctuate accordingly.

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: HARA is pleased to announce a new partnership with BridgeX Network, the framework for a financial ecosystem of decentralized credit, conversion, and payment solutions. Through their service, BridgeX Network will help facilitate the conversion between crypto and fiat currencies in the HARA ecosystem.  ‚ÄúHARA is an interesting project. The other ICO companies that we‚Äôve seen seem like they‚Äôre very catered to the developed countries, whereas HARA is reaching out to the unbanked, the actual problems that we see, and providing a digital solution for them,‚Äù‚Ää‚Äî‚ÄäHiroyuki Kiga, COO at BridgeX.  ‚ÄúWe thought that HARA, with their project trying to access the rural area, would be a good partnership to have, because it would give us access to a community that we don‚Äôt have as well. We‚Äôre all about helping HARA make crypto to fiat payments for the rural area, for the farmers.‚Äù  The partnership between BridgeX Network and HARA is instrumental for both partners to extend their services to a new, untapped demographic: the smallholder farmer in the rural areas of Indonesia and abroad. The collaboration will help bring many unbanked people on board and help them get access to the services they need to improve their quality of life.  HARA is looking forward to teaming up with the BridgeX Network to create a real social impact that will empower millions around the globe.  Check our website for more updates!

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: Who are the Data providers in the HARA ecosystem?  In the HARA Ecosystem, various types of data providers are incentivized to input their data into the exchange. Data companies, cooperatives, field agents, NGOs, farmers, and satellites are all examples of entities that can take up the role of the data provider.  On the initial deployment, a HARA Field Officer will assist the farmer in using the HARA app to input their basic data. The field officer will make sure that the farmer will from then on be able to independently use the HARA app in an appropriate manner to ensure continuous use. The farmer will then input the raw data to the HARA app, from which the data will be processed to the HARA Data Exchange. After the data has been processed, the Network Operator will distribute the loyalty points both to the farmer and field officer.  The HARA Ecosystem has an incredible potential to improve the lives of millions of smallholder farmers around the globe. This article showed how smallholder farmers can participate in the ecosystem as a data provider.

Author: siddanggie
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: In HARA data exchange, how do you ensure that data qualifiers are providing accurate data?

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: Thanks for asking! HARA is implementing a machine learning algorithms to ensure accurate data quality over vast amounts of samples. Additionally, HARA data exchange platform provides a data qualification mechanism that is supported by data rating features to evaluate data sets based on input such as historical transactions, and buyer feedback and connected data points. Any submitted data on the exchange must earn a minimum rating before any exchange can happen.  To know more about the data qualification mechanism that HARA is implementing, you can read our whitepaper. Also, follow us in our telegram to get more updates.

Author: anastasia.graciaa
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: If I am a data provider, what will happen to my data if my account has been deleted?

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: Hello! HARA data exchange supports the rights to rectification and erasure. Data providers are in absolute control of their data sets. When an account is deleted in the platform, private keys will be destroyed, implying loss of corresponding and encrypted data. Also, they will lose the ability to exchange but they still retain full control of their data.  To learn more about this, you can check our whitepaper.

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: "Hara is an Indonesia-based agriculture-focused data exchange that brings together data from multiple sources and facilitates data access for banks, insurance companies, retailers, agriculture input suppliers, NGOs, and government agencies. One of the many benefits of having so many different types of data related to agriculture on a decentralized data exchange is that it enables improved access to funding for farmers, which in turn helps them to buy seed and other inputs to increase their production.‚Äù  HARA is recognized as an effective blockchain project to improve food and agriculture supply chains around the world. Our initiative to improve the agriculture sector has brought us to more than just recognition from the blockchain community!  Read this article about the Six Ways Blockchain is Being Used in Food and Agriculture Supply Chains.

Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: Is there a way for a data provider to know if their data is being accessed? Thanks

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: Thanks for asking! Yeah, of course. Data providers are notified whenever data buyers want to access their data. This is realized through a document provider smart contract that grants access permission to any stored data. When data buyers want to access data, the system notifies the owner of the data or data provider via blockchain. The blockchain verifies data availability using the proof of existence smart contract.    Read our whitepaper to learn more about the smart contracts that we provide in our data exchange platform. Also, join us in our Telegram to get more updates.

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: HARA is pleased to announce a partnership with HEXA Agro, a wholesaler of agricultural products. It functions as the off-taker in a closed loop farming ecosystem that they themselves established in the Tojo Una-Una Regency, Central Sulawesi. The ecosystem ensures a fair price for the farmers‚Äô yield while helping them get access to the microcredit Kredit Usaha Rakyat (KUR) to support their business.  In order for banks to extend the KUR microcredit, data is required about both the farmers and their farms. In the collaboration between HARA and HEXA Agro, HARA got farmers and field data to help Bank BNI, which is also part of the HEXA ecosystem, to disburse the KUR microcredit to local farmers.  HARA is looking forward to continuing the cooperation with HEXA Agro. Together, we will be able to create a real positive impact on thousands of smallholder farmers in a remote area of Indonesia.   Read more about this partnership here. Join us on Telegram to get more HARA updates.

Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: Did you know that HARA Token holders can serve as a data qualifier?  In the HARA Ecosystem, a data qualifier can be anyone who holds HARA Token and interacts with the data provider community, or transacts with the data providers in the supply chain. Basically, anyone that is able to vouch for a data provider can serve as a data qualifier.  For example, a neighbor or local merchant can attest to the quantity and quality of the produce grown by a farmer, and qualify the data that farmer has entered into the data exchange. Data qualifiers are incentivized with HARA Token to do their part consistently.  To learn more about the role of a data qualifier, you can check this article. Thanks

Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: HARA is built on top of blockchain technology ensuring the all exchanging data to be smartly secured and traceable. Here are      5 smart contracts provided by the blockchain in HARA!  Data acquisition: Enables access control and data connection to supplementary data. It allows for automatic data generation and enrichment. Data traceability: Enables tracking the origin of data, who owns and use it. Data rating: Enables measurement on how useable the data is, like a rating system of the data by data buyers. Data access permission: Enables access to every data providers. Proceeds allocation: Enables the distribution of proceeds between participants.  Read our whitepaper to get to know more about our project!

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: Hello, HARA Data Exchange creates a virtuous cycle with the interplay between all the different stakeholders. Data providers such as smallholder farmers, field agents, big data companies or satellites input their data and get rewarded with loyalty points. Data buyers such as banks, insurance companies, government institutions, and private enterprises provide the incentives by buying the data. Value-added services are incentivized to enrich the data, and data qualifiers are incentivized to improve the quality of the data for doing simple tasks like verifying the quality of data. To ensure the health of the ecosystem, HARA makes use of a staking mechanism that helps differentiate between active and dormant accounts.  Here is a photo that explains the HARA ecosystem.                             You can read our whitepaper and join us in our Telegram Community to learn more about HARA.

Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: HARA is pleased to announce our new Advisor, Taco Bottema, PhD  With his more than 20 years of senior managerial experience from the United Nations, the European Union, and the Asian Development Bank, Bottema is a welcome addition to HARA‚Äôs advisors. His extensive knowledge in sustainable agriculture will be able to provide keen insights on the development and implementation of HARA and will help to optimize the social impacts to the ecosystem.  For the full list of our advisors, read our whitepaper. Read the whole article here.

Author: anastasia.graciaa
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: Hello, one of the benefits a smallholder farmer can gain access to using HARA Data Exchange Platform is the application for loans. The farmer simply needs to have submitted enough data and upload a certified land title document along with associated data to receive loans and other financial services. To give you an example, our partnership with BNI has already had results that exceeded our initial expectations. There, we enabled over 150 farmers from two villages to apply for microcredit in a very short time. That is something we can build on to further develop the project.  Follow us in our Telegram Community to get involved with HARA! Thanks

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: The HARA Data Exchange Platform is a decentralized, secure and transparent platform that is built on top of an Ethereum-enabled blockchain. HARA securely connects and governs data providers and buyers in its ecosystem with a market-driven revenue distribution model and proprietary rating system. It also uses Ethereum to create smart contracts, trace and validate transactions and ownership rights, perform transactions through HARA tokens, and enable tokens to be traded on third-party token exchanges.  To learn more about this, you can read our whitepaper and this article. Also, follow us on our Telegram to get more updates. Thanks

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: Another welcome to our new Advisor, Mr. Wolf Kluge!   As a pioneer in providing financial access to Indonesians, Mr. Kluge created a wide range of lending products and built the base for the digitalization of the loan approval process for smallholder businesses.  Mr. Kluge previously held positions on BTPN (One of the largest banks in Indonesia), Deutsche Bank, Aegis Korea, and Danamon, in several countries around the world. As a seasoned financial risk expert, Kluge is now advising on the development of lending products in the HARA ecosystem.  To see the full list of our advisors, check our whitepaper. Also, join us in our Telegram Community to get more updates about HARA.

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: For data protection, our collected data is securely stored and processed in the HARA data exchange platform. A combination of IPFS permanent web, Bluezelle protocols, and Amazon web services (S3 and Dynamo DB) will be implemented as data storage systems off the chain, protecting their data and allowing data providers to manage their data sets.  HARA make sure that every data is secured and protected.  Visit us on our website and read our whitepaper to learn more about this. Also, join us in our Telegram Community for more updates. Thanks

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: Meet our HARA Field Agents around Indonesia!  Since last July to August, our Development Team shared their stories while visiting our Field Agents on the Districts of Sugihwaras, Ngraho, Sumberejo, and Sukosewu in Bojonegoro. With a minimum access to the remote areas, HARA successfully saved the moments with these pictures.  Armed with official letter of duty, handphone and HARA t-shirt as special identity, all Field Agents are finally ready to continue their jobs to help farmers join HARA Ecosystem by assisting farmers in registering their profiles and continuously collecting agriculture data throughout the farming cycle of cultivation, harvest and post-harvest seasons. Smart contracts award tokens to these data providers in the form of loyalty points, and the farmers can collect incentives (such as discounts on fertilizers and seeds) through local partners also in the HARA ecosystem.  In our recent update, HARA is now active in six different regencies where we have attracted over 5600 farmers and have tagged an area of over 1100 hectares.  Be part of our journey to make a better world with HARA by joining our Telegram Community. Thanks!

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: Value added services enrich the raw data that the data providers add to the HARA Ecosystem. For example, they might compile the data from all the data providers in a certain area or of a certain profession, and publish structured reports of their findings. Thus the contributions of these actors will add extra value to the data that is already available on the HARA Data Exchange. The value added services play an important role in the HARA Ecosystem. The enriched data they produce will be incredibly valuable and attract more data buyers, which is to the benefit of the overall health of the ecosystem.  Learn more about value-added services in the HARA ecosystem here.

Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: Yes, you are right! Smallholder farmers has a lot of benefits they can gain. Not only will the data exchange open up an extra source of income to them, the data collected will also help to increase the efficiency of their production. They are incentivized to input their data in exchange for loyalty points which they can exchange for a variety of goods and services at designated kiosks. For example, farmers can use the points to get discounts on agriculture products, phone credits, or school supplies.  Also, the farmers will be able to get access to market information and financial services, as well as get access to precision farming advice which could help them attain greater yields. The HARA Ecosystem has an incredible potential to improve the lives of millions of smallholder farmers around the globe. Hoping for the best!  Join us in our Telegram Community to get more updates about our project.

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: Hello, by being part of HARA, our farmers can gain access to many benefits including the access to precision farming advice catered specifically to their farm to help them produce greater yields, access to recommendations regarding the farm inputs, access to market information specific to each farm, access to other non-banking financial services, access to market data related, ability to receive loans and other financial services and ability to earn loyalty points that can be redeemed for variety of goods and services  provided by HARA partners.  You can read more about the benefits of our smallholder farmers in our whitepaper. Also, join us in our Telegram Community for more updates!

Author: 97bj91
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: Hello, what are the types of data does a farmer needs to provide to receive incentives? How frequent should they provide these data?

Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: A smallholder farmers can provide different types of data such as Farmer Related Data which includes their personal profile. Cultivation Data such as harvest, planting, and farm data. Location Specific Data, for which they can provide info about their field ownership and status. Ecological Data are about the type of soil, pest, and diseases. Market Information and Transactional Data are information about the market, yield transactions, and business.  The frequency of how much they will provide these data will depend on their desire to earn points for rewards. HARA gamified the system in such a way that, for every data they will provide, it will earn them a number of points which they can use to redeem later.  You can read our whitepaper to know more about our use cases. Also, join us in our Telegram Community to get more updates about HARA.

Data qualifiers are incentivized with HARA Token to do their part consistently. The work they perform will add to the rating of the data sets on the HARA Data Exchange, influencing buyers to acquire certain data sets. The data qualifiers help lift the HARA Data Exchange to a higher level of usefulness and guarantee the visibility of quality data.   Want to learn more about data qualifiers? Author: HARAToken
Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: HARA is designed to facilitate data decentralization. It simplifies data connectivity to all stakeholders and ensures that data ownership belongs to data providers. Data providers get incentivized through tokens. Aside from that, HARA also offers more affordable data management system for the data buyers and provides traceable and transparent data that can be continuously verified.  In general, HARA is a solution that bridges the digital and real world through applied applications geared for farms, markets, consumers, and other stakeholders that supports the efforts to ensure food security and secure solid economic growth for all.   You can read our whitepaper here and join us in our Telegram Community.

Title: [ANN-ICO-AIRDROP] HARA üåê Empowering Billions Through Data, One Byte At A Time.
Body: Hi, Thank you for your questions. In order to verify kyc, QUOINEX individual account owners will need to provide the following documents to get their account approved and have access to full exchange services:  ID document: A clear scanned image or PDF file of your valid government-issued ID (passport, national ID, or driver's license) Your selfie: The photo needs to be taken full face, head-on, with no distortions or shadows or reflections of light. A light, neutral background is preferred. Proof of address: A clear scanned image or PDF file of a recent utility bill or official document that reflects your name and current address. Proof of address has to be within 3 months.  For more information regarding required documents HERE.
